sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Cordera, a Master Planned Community in northeast Colorado Springs, is thoughtfully designed to offer excellent amenities such as an extensive trail system, cul-de-sac streets, storybook themed parks, the 5 acre Grand Lawn Park, a top-notch landscaping program, high architectural standards, and the state-of-the-art Community Center!
